sections.title: Information we collect
body: We collect details you provide when placing an order or contacting the studio.
We also collect limited device data to improve performance and security.

sections.title: How we use information
body: We use your information to process orders, provide support, and communicate updates.
We do not sell personal data.

sections.title: Orders
body: Orders are confirmed by email once payment is authorized.
We reserve the right to limit quantities for limited-release items.

sections.title: Returns
body: Returns are accepted within 14 days of delivery for unused items.
Return shipping is the responsibility of the customer unless otherwise stated.

sections.title: Delivery windows
body: Orders ship within 2-4 business days unless otherwise noted.
International delivery timelines vary by destination.

sections.title: Tracking
body: Tracking details are shared once the order leaves the studio.

sections.title: Return policy
body: Returns are accepted within 14 days of delivery for unused items.
Return requests must include the original order number.

sections.title: Condition
body: Items must be returned in original packaging and condition.
